document_data.caption: A map showing Maernath Storage on the Street of Curtains.
document_data.name: Maernath Storage
document_data.mainbody: '''Maernath Storage''' was a warehouse located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The building stood two stories tall.
document_data.Location: Maernath Storage was located in the central section of the [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] on the north side of the [[Street of Curtains]].
